column4: I recently moved my laptop to Hardy, I'm a relative n00b. I've been reading on slashdot about a 3d compiz cube. I'd really like to try it, what packages do I need?
ehhhh, the integrated intel one that came with the laptop? Where could i find this info in GNOME?
The wobbly windows work really slick, I like them a lot
"advanced desktop settings effects" is under system>preferences, if you have that you should be able to enable your cube
